pyzui.tiledmediaobject module¶

Tiled media to be displayed in the ZUI.

class pyzui.tiledmediaobject.TiledMediaObject(media_id, scene, autofit=True)[source]¶

Bases: MediaObject

TileMedia object Wrap given media_id in MediaObject type, (calling converter if necessary) the so that it that can be rendered in the ZUI.

If autofit is True, then once the media has loaded it will be fitted to the area occupied by the placeholder.

Constructor: TiledMediaObject(string, Scene[, bool])

Create a new MediaObject from the media identified by media_id, and the parent Scene referenced by scene.

transparent = False¶
default_size = (256, 256)¶
tempcache = 5¶
render(painter, mode)[source]¶

Render the media using the given painter and rendering mode.

render(QPainter, int) -> None

Precondition: mode is equal to one of the constants defined in RenderMode

property onscreen_size¶

The on-screen size of the image.
